songs.title: Gorillaz
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus: Pimp C]
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Ain’t no nigga
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Ain’t no nigga

[Verse 1: Pimp C]
See me rolling like him
Eats baby... smoking...
Pain is so vivid like I drove the...
The laws poking...
When I turn... tell me what you hear
Gorillaz in my trunk
..got the brains blowing on us
Stay Gucci, low diet, sitting on...

[Chorus: Pimp C]
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Ain’t no nigga
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Ain’t no nigga

[Verse 2: Underdawgz]
Hit the the dough pop up, peanut butter Cush
Twenty six inch base, got me chopping boys up!
Candy.. wanna lick it up
My Gorilaz cut up, getting beaten, pulling up!
Sitting... DJ screw...
..full of grain, he took by my...
Cause nigga learn to hate...
Ain’t no nigga
Beaten down the block...
Yokohoma... let me slide like I’m skating
..we’re painting
Nigga I ain’t faking, I don’t...
A little conversation before I ....
Take me and let the...
O if I’m being pulled up, you niggas know what’s up!

[Chorus: Pimp C]
I got:
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Ain’t no nigga
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Ain’t no nigga

[Verse 3: Bun B]
When I pull up on your...
Put the word out on the street and let ‘em know...
...let me make it crystal clear
... in your ear, use the hate and disappear, disappear!
You gotta be...
It’s the G shit, the.. shit
I don’t fuck with you, and you don’t fuck with me, shit!
Use what we spit is fire, blazing
And it’s so amazing like smoking purple...
I’m posted...
I’m about to put it on the street and make...
..is gonna happen, regardless
..how you feel about it...
Don’t make me have to bring the.. out!

[Chorus: Pimp C]
I got:
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Ain’t no niggea
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Gorillaz in my trunk
Ain’t no nigga
